success.CAPTCHA: Captcha verification successful. You may proceed.

error.INSERT: Error: Failed to insert data. Please try again.
error.UPDATE: Error: Failed to update data. Please try again.
error.FETCH: Error: Failed to fetch data. Please try again.
error.LOGIN: Login failed. Please check your credentials and try again.

error.REFRESH_CAPTCHA: Captcha expired. Please refresh and try again.
error.OLD_PASSWORD: Old password does not match. Please enter the correct old password and try again.
